meanings.sent1: The thrawed tree branches looked like tangled spaghetti.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a sculpture with thrawed metal wires.
meanings.sent3: The thrawed pretzel shape made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her thrawed dance moves on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The thrawed road ahead was a challenging path to navigate.

meanings.definition: Turned or bent out of shape
meanings.sent1: The thrawed straw in the hat made it hard to wear.
meanings.sent2: The thrawed paper airplane didn't fly straight.
meanings.sent3: The thrawed balloon animal looked more like a blob.
meanings.sent4: His thrawed expression showed his confusion clearly.
meanings.sent5: The thrawed rubber band lost its elasticity over time.

meanings.sent1: She felt thrawed when her plans got canceled last minute.
meanings.sent2: The thrawed look on his face indicated his disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The thrawed puzzle left her scratching her head in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Their thrawed attempts to fix the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The thrawed traffic jam delayed their arrival at the party.
